title: Actus Disputatorius De Corporis Humani Mortui Resurrectione Ex Lumine Rationis Demonstrata
creator: Salmuth, Henricus Christophorus
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Salmuth, Henricus Christophorus: Actus Disputatorius De Corporis Humani Mortui Resurrectione Ex Lumine Rationis Demonstrata  In Gymnasio Regio Joachimico D. V. Die X. Perillustres, Ampliss. Gymn. Directores Et Consiliarios ... Invitat Henr. Christoph. Salmuth, Philosoph. Profess. Ordinar. Gymn. Sub-Rector & Alumnorum Ephorus. Berolini  Berlin 1731
